channel.title: Something to post
channel.description:
Here is what I am working on right now
*Update - I will be finishing this once I'm 99 Divination on RuneScape. Currently level 90 :P gotta get my comp cape back. *Update 2 - 95 now, should be 99 soon and I will finish this project.
Things to do, //--Material--// Bake out all maps (To low poly version). Edit colormap in photoshop for more detail. Refine metal material. Work on emission map.
//--Mesh--// Re-mesh into low poly version. * Almost done with this part. Been trying to figure out Maya more so I can bake better maps. Going from around 1.6 million faces down to around 2-3k. I will probably bring it up to 5k to enhance the deail futher.
Add armature. Add right leg cap. /Done Finish back of helmet. /Done but will probably add more detail. Add more little objects (backpack area for the head spots). Make weapon (Probably a big axe) Round out knee cap lights. /Done Chain mail pants? Maybe. Destroy the symmetrical parts. Finish detail on boots. Add more muscle? Add tassels lots of tassels. [img]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/TestRender1.png[/img]

[/quote]
Nah, That’s the signature/banner forums area.[/quote]Amy’s right, this is for RS models only. Or models that can work on the RS2 cache. I don’t think it matters either way though; both boards are dead enough

item.title: Something to post
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

Here is what I am working on right now

*Update - I will be finishing this once I’m 99 Divination on RuneScape. Currently level 90 gotta get my comp cape back.
*Update 2 - 95 now, should be 99 soon and I will finish this project.

Things to do,
//–Material–//
Bake out all maps (To low poly version).
Edit colormap in photoshop for more detail.
Refine metal material.
Work on emission map.

//–Mesh–//
Re-mesh into low poly version.

  • Almost done with this part. Been trying to figure out Maya more so I can bake better maps. Going from around 1.6 million faces down to around 2-3k. I will probably bring it up to 5k to enhance the deail futher.

Add armature.
Add right leg cap. /Done
Finish back of helmet. /Done but will probably add more detail.
Add more little objects (backpack area for the head spots).
Make weapon (Probably a big axe)
Round out knee cap lights. /Done
Chain mail pants? Maybe.
Destroy the symmetrical parts.
Finish detail on boots.
Add more muscle?
Add tassels lots of tassels.

Read full topic
